note:
“Let the blood of the pigs run red. Run red down the capitol steps.” - Blood of Pigs by Hellmouth

Profile picture is of a white male in his 40s. He has a goatee and wearing a black beanie. He’s wearing lightly darkened glasses.

Header picture is of LEGO’s Lion Knights' Castle during construction. Specifically, the bathroom. The picture is off-kilter, with the actual toilet in the background.

fields.name: website
fields.value: https://quentinhill.com

fields.name: Elephant Graveyard by Cobalt
fields.value: All you wanted was comfort. All you got were graves.

fields.name: The Ghost Psalm by Zao
fields.value: My companions are walking corpses. I am buried with their words.

fields.name: My Throat is an Open Grave by Demon Hunter
fields.value: It feels good to be alive. I’ve been dead for so long.
